languages.text: Вигдис Сурри Отта из рода Толиман несла на всех вокс-частотах весть о чудовищной измене, что была совершена. Голос ее не дрожал от ужаса, когда она произносила страшные слова "Вольный Торговец фон Валанциус предал{mf||а} Человечество". Потом она замолчала.

Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman line was on every vox-frequency carrying the news of the heinous treason that had been committed. Her voice did not tremble with horror when she uttered the terrible words, "Rogue Trader von Valancius has betrayed Humanity." Then she fell silent.
languages.original_text: Вигдис Сурри Отта из рода Толиман несла на всех вокс-частотах весть о чудовищной измене, что была совершена. Голос ее не дрожал от ужаса, когда она произносила страшные слова "Вольный Торговец фон Валанциус предал{mf||а} Человечество". Потом она замолчала.

Her voice did not tremble with horror when she uttered the terrible words, "Rogue Trader von Valancius has betrayed Humanity." Then she fell silent.

Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman line was on every vox-frequency carrying the news of the heinous treason that had been committed. Her voice did not tremble with horror when she uttered the terrible words, "Rogue Trader von Valancius has betrayed Humanity." Then she fell silent.

languages.text: 来自托里曼家族的维格迪斯·苏里·欧塔在每个音阵频道上传播着行商浪人叛国重罪的消息。“冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人背叛了人类。”当她说出这句可怕的话时，她的声音并没有由于恐惧而颤抖。在那之后，她便陷入了沉默。
languages.original_text: Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman line was on every vox-frequency carrying the news of the heinous treason that had been committed. Her voice did not tremble with horror when she uttered the terrible words, "Rogue Trader von Valancius has betrayed Humanity." Then she fell silent.

traits.locale_text: 来自托里曼家族的维格迪斯·苏里·欧塔在每个音阵频道上传播着行商浪人叛国重罪的消息。“冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人背叛了人类。”当她说出这句可怕的话时，她的声音并没有由于恐惧而颤抖。在那之后，她便陷入了沉默。

languages.text: トイルマンのヴィグディス・スール・アウタは、凶悪な国家に対する叛逆行為のニュースを全てのヴォクス周波に乗せて伝えた。恐ろしい言葉を発する時でさえ、彼女の声は恐怖に震えることはなかった。「自由開拓者のフォン・ヴァランシウスが人類を裏切った」。そして彼女は沈黙した。
languages.original_text: Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman line was on every vox-frequency carrying the news of the heinous treason that had been committed. Her voice did not tremble with horror when she uttered the terrible words, "Rogue Trader von Valancius has betrayed Humanity." Then she fell silent.

traits.locale_text: トイルマンのヴィグディス・スール・アウタは、凶悪な国家に対する叛逆行為のニュースを全てのヴォクス周波に乗せて伝えた。恐ろしい言葉を発する時でさえ、彼女の声は恐怖に震えることはなかった。「自由開拓者のフォン・ヴァランシウスが人類を裏切った」。そして彼女は沈黙した。

languages.text: Vigdis Surri Otta de la lignée Toliman transmit la nouvelle de l'odieuse trahison qui avait été commise sur toute la gamme de fréquences-vox. Sa voix ne trembla pas d'effroi en prononçant ces terribles mots : « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} von Valancius a trahi l'humanité ». Puis elle se tut.
languages.original_text: Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman line was on every vox-frequency carrying the news of the heinous treason that had been committed. Her voice did not tremble with horror when she uttered the terrible words, "Rogue Trader von Valancius has betrayed Humanity." Then she fell silent.

traits.locale_text: Vigdis Surri Otta de la lignée Toliman transmit la nouvelle de l'odieuse trahison qui avait été commise sur toute la gamme de fréquences-vox. Sa voix ne trembla pas d'effroi en prononçant ces terribles mots : « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} von Valancius a trahi l'humanité ». Puis elle se tut.

languages.text: Vigdis Surri Otta de la línea Toliman contactó todas las frecuencias de vocos para informar sobre la espantosa traición que se había cometido. Su voz no tembló de miedo al proclamar su terrible mensaje: «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius ha traicionado a la Humanidad». Después, se quedó en silencio.
languages.original_text: Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman line was on every vox-frequency carrying the news of the heinous treason that had been committed. Her voice did not tremble with horror when she uttered the terrible words, "Rogue Trader von Valancius has betrayed Humanity." Then she fell silent.

traits.locale_text: Vigdis Surri Otta de la línea Toliman contactó todas las frecuencias de vocos para informar sobre la espantosa traición que se había cometido. Su voz no tembló de miedo al proclamar su terrible mensaje: «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius ha traicionado a la Humanidad». Después, se quedó en silencio.

languages.text: Vigdis Surr Otta aus der Toliman-Linie verbreitete auf allen Vox-Frequenzen die Nachricht von dem schändlichen Verrat. Ihre Stimme zitterte nicht vor Angst, als sie die furchtbaren Worte sagte: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} von Valancius hat die Menschheit verraten." Danach verstummte sie.
languages.original_text: Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman line was on every vox-frequency carrying the news of the heinous treason that had been committed. Her voice did not tremble with horror when she uttered the terrible words, "Rogue Trader von Valancius has betrayed Humanity." Then she fell silent.

traits.locale_text: Vigdis Surr Otta aus der Toliman-Linie verbreitete auf allen Vox-Frequenzen die Nachricht von dem schändlichen Verrat. Ihre Stimme zitterte nicht vor Angst, als sie die furchtbaren Worte sagte: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} von Valancius hat die Menschheit verraten." Danach verstummte sie.

languages.text: Toliman soyundan Vigdis Surri Otta, bütün voks frekanslarını kullanarak yaşanan iğrenç ihanetin haberini yaydı. Korkudan titremeyen bir sesle, dehşet verici "Hür Tacir von Valancius, İnsanlığa ihanet etmiştir." ifadesini sarf etti ve ardından sessizliğe gömüldü.
languages.original_text: Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman line was on every vox-frequency carrying the news of the heinous treason that had been committed. Her voice did not tremble with horror when she uttered the terrible words, "Rogue Trader von Valancius has betrayed Humanity." Then she fell silent.

traits.locale_text: Toliman hattındaki Vigdis Surri Otta, bütün voks frekanslarını kullanarak, meydana gelen iğrenç ihanete dair haberleri yaydı. O dehşet verici sözleri sarf ederken sesi korkudan titremiyordu: "Hür Tacir von Valancius, İnsanlığa ihanet etmiştir." Ardından sessizliğe gömüldü.
